creator: jplejacq@quoininc.com
text:
When creating a new document at the same level as home, the document id contains
an extra "/" prefix.  This causes the URI to be formed incorrectly breaking
navigation.

Going to the site tab and selecting and node on the sitetree fixes the problem.
 While a work around, it is not intuitive to a non technical person

Which Lenya version do you use?
Can you reproduce the problem at http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8888/default/ ?
creator: roku@apache.org
jplejacq@quoininc.com
text:
I have a local build on recent checkout from SVN.  However, it looks
like it is working on http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8888/default/.  I will do a
clean refresh and build to validate.
Which Cocoon version do you use?
creator: roku@apache.org
